protocol.name: P-GSE44655-1
protocol.text: The data were RMA normalized using GeneSpring 11.5.1. ID_REF =  VALUE = Normalized log2 signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE44655-2
protocol.text: The samples were incubated for 1 h at 37°C in a water bath.

protocol.name: P-GSE44655-3
protocol.text: The seeds were sowed in 0.5X MS medium, then treated in 4°C for 3 days to synchronize the germination and grown in 22°C for 7 days with 16 h of light (120 mmol m-2 s-1).

protocol.name: P-GSE44655-4
protocol.text: Total RNA of plant tissues was isolated according to the method of Oñate-Sánchez and Vicente-Carbajosa (2008, BMC Research Notes, 1, 93 (PMID 18937828)).

protocol.name: P-GSE44655-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE44655-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Arrays. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix® GeneChip® Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE44655-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip® Scanner 3000.
